sub_title: Group Internal Quality Assurance Auditor at I-SEC International Security B.V.
summary:
Group Internal Quality Assurance Auditor 
I-SEC International Security B.V. 
November 2020 - present  
Amsterdam area, The Netherlands
-Group/Global Subsidiary Operations Quality Auditor
-Group/Global Subsidiary ISO 9001 and ISO 14001 auditor

Information and Liaison Specialist at Product Control and Training Department (PCAT)
(and from JAN 2019 Operations Consultant within the Group)
I-SEC International Security B.V. 
April 1998 – November 2020 , Amsterdam Area, The Netherlands

- Quality Assurance of all I-SEC subsidiaries (Europe/Asia)
- Regular auditing of all subsidiaries (Europe/Asia)
- Conducting TSA-related trainings: AOSSP Chapter 11, AIM, AIM-A, (CBA, D-CBA), BDO in Europe, Asia and Americas
- Creation and conducting of various tailor-made training sessions for all I- SEC subsidiaries and external clients worldwide
- Advisory role in numerous start-ups (training, compliance and logistics) on 25 airports in more than 20 countries worldwide.
	
Security Advisor and Instructor on AMS (TSA- and HBS-related courses)
Pro-check International (former I-SEC subsidiary)
April 1998 – April 2010 (Amsterdam Airport, The Netherlands
Supervision of the whole TSA & EU based Security Concept/ Operation
Certified for :
- Security Interviewing approved by the TSA: AOSSP Chapter 11, AIM, AIM-A, CBA, D-CBA, BDO
- All below-wing security operations
- L3 Examiner (advanced CT X-ray)
- Certified Air Cargo Security Advisor (Dutch: BAL), (AMS, 2011- present)
- Certifiied for Security Awareness Trainings in Air Cargo/Catering/Cleaning Industry (AMS, since 2012)
- Certified for CCE (Controlled Cognitive Engagement), Security Interview Technique (London, 2012)
- Head developer of CBA (Cognitive Behavioural Assesment) TSA certified training program (Amsterdam, 2014)
- Co-developer of D-CBA (Detection-CBA) (AKA: BDO) TSA certified training program (Amsterdam 2018)
- ASAT training in Situational Risk Assessment provided by ORBIS Operations for DL (Atlanta, 2015)
- Approved instructor for UA BDO training program (Chicago, 2019)
- Certified for Port Facility Security Officer (PFSO) (SOLAS/ISPS code) training program (Rotterdam, 2020)
